description: File containing tests to run.
Platforms to run tests on.
CPU architecture to run tests on.
If specified, runner will only print list of tests without running them
Specifies an output XML file for test results. XML contains states of executed tests and possible failure messages.
Number of times to execute each test.
Split tests into test sets. Number of tests in one test set.
Additional relative paths to search for extensions separated by ';'
Regex test filter.
Category of tests to be executed.
Category of tests to be excluded.
Specifies the area to run the tests in.
Specifies the C# file with tests to run.
Text file with test to run. Each test must be placed on a newline.
Path to store generated project.
Path to store generated player.
Path to store build and run artifacts
Graphics API based on GraphicsDeviceType.
Force the game to use Direct3D 11 for rendering via the -force-d3d11 player command line switch; false is default.

Force the game to use OpenGL 3/4 core profile for rendering via the -force-glcore player command line switch. The Editor tries to use the best OpenGL version available and all OpenGL extensions exposed by the OpenGL drivers. If the platform isn't supported, Direct3D is used; false is default.
Force the game to use Vulkan for rendering via the -force-vulkan player command line switch. If the platform isn't supported, Direct3D is used; false is default.
Force single threaded rendering via the -force-gfx-direct player command line switch; false is default.
Force multi threaded rendering via the -force-gfx-mt player command line switch; true is default.
Force graphics jobs rendering via the -force-gfx-jobs player command line switch; false is default.
Player scriptingbackend.
Player colorspacemode.
Will save all the option definitions to specified file. Used by external tools
XR device to run tests on.

XR targets to enable in player settings separated by ';'. Values: 
"Oculus"
"OpenVR"
"cardboard"
"daydream"
Stereo rendering path currently enabled; MultiPass is default.
Build development player; true is default.

Minimum  Android SDK version to use for XR player settings. Use API level value: 
Android 4.1 'Jelly Bean' (API level 16)
Android 4.2 'Jelly Bean' (API level 17)
Android 4.3 'Jelly Bean' (API level 18)
Android 4.4 'Kit Kat' (API level 19)
Android 5.0 'Lollipop' (API level 21)
Android 5.1 'Lollipop' (API level 22)
Android 6.0 'Marshmallow' (API level 23)
Android 7.0 'Nougat' (API level 24)
Android 7.1 'Nougat' (API level 25)
Android 8.0 'Oreo' (API level 26)

Target Android SDK version to use for XR player settings. Use API level value: 
Android 4.1 'Jelly Bean' (API level 16)
Android 4.2 'Jelly Bean' (API level 17)
Android 4.3 'Jelly Bean' (API level 18)
Android 4.4 'Kit Kat' (API level 19)
Android 5.0 'Lollipop' (API level 21)
Android 5.1 'Lollipop' (API level 22)
Android 6.0 'Marshmallow' (API level 23)
Android 7.0 'Nougat' (API level 24)
Android 7.1 'Nougat' (API level 25)
Android 8.0 'Oreo' (API level 26)
Specifies the scripting runtime version to run the tests with.
Set API Compatibility Profile
